participant_1.background:
I love sushi because it reminds me of the ocean, where my beta fish lives.
i m too short to reach the top shelf.
my favorite drink is iced coffee.
I recently got to dress up and explore my nerdy side at Comic Con.
someday i would like a truck.

participant_2.background:
I look through my old trophy case to remind myself of a simpler time.
i m almost finished with my degree.
I'm not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that.
I am quite short, only five foot four.
My hobbies include coloring my hair bright colors and trying new coffee shops with my husband.

content.text: I recently got to dress up at Comic Con and it was really fun! I love dressing up and pretending to be someone else.
That's great! I wish I could have gone to Comic Con. I love dressing up and being someone else too. I like to change my hair color too.
Oh cool! What color do you have it right now?
It's blue right now! I'm thinking about changing it to purple next.
Purple would be really cool! I've always wanted to dye my hair but I'm too scared.
You should go for it! It's really fun to change up your look.
I might have to try it sometime! I'm also hoping to get a truck someday. I think they're really cool.
Trucks are great! I wish I had one. I'm not too tall so it's hard for me to reach the top of the shelves.
I know what you mean! I'm short too so I have to use a step stool to reach things.
Me too! But we're both pretty short so we can be short friends
